summary: inspired from the Darksiders\' opening cinematic.
descriptionHtml:
this is just an edit of LionHeartedGamer\'s War savegame that changes and makes more realistic of War\'s face that shown at the end of the Darksiders\' opening cinematic.
there is no need so say that to have the War\'s armor is a primary requirement of course and used no any other mods but skyrim\'s own attributes to form this face.
link to the armor:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14392 by cat_woman1989
there is another mod that i think goes well with this : nightmare shadowmere http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18856 by AlienSlof (it resembles War\'s horse Ruin...well...just a thought)
updated:deleted dirty beard and the shadows on the face modified to be much more realistic due to wearing the hood and some small changes...
author: hemmedo
